title: New client wont open.
body: So today I wanted to update my old league client to the new one, after the update finished i hit Play and nothing pop up, i closed the client and re-opened and still nothing, every time the "League Of Legends" logo pops up the client  disappears. Is this a issue of the client?

replies.body:
When you try launching the patcher, your OS has to essentially say "yea you're cool, go ahead". If your pc doesn't have the right permissions set up, your OS instead blocks it and won't let it open. You can follow our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to set up those permissions, and you should be playing again!

Hit me up if you have any other issues!
